text: Five-week-old female BALB/c mice were divided into four immunization groups (n = 12 mice/ group): (1) PBS control (100 μl), (2) killed vaccine (2.0 μg killed vaccine), (3) AcHERV-HA (1×10 7 FFU/50 μl) and (4) AcHERV-VLP (1×10 7 FFU/50 μl). All mice received two immunizing doses at 2-weeks intervals by intramuscular injection (days 0 and 14, hind limb), serum samples were collected days 0, 7 and 21 after first immunization (day 0). Serum samples were obtained by centrifugation of whole blood collected from right external jugular vein. Also, two mice per group (n = 2/group) were sedated and sacrificed with efforts to minimize their suffering, then their spleens were removed on days 28.
